name: market for photovoltaics, electric installation for 3kWp module, at building | photovoltaics, electric installation for 3kWp module, at building | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/943/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'photovoltaics, electric installation for 3kWp module, at building', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
